article_metadata.author: Christina LaMontagne

og.description: When a job loss impacts your ability to pay health insurance premiums, losing your coverage and gaining significant medical bills is a real possibility. Fortunately, in most cases, your policy won’t be canceled immediately, giving you some time to catch up.
og.title: Behind On Health Insurance Premiums: What Happens?
